Text:
i did a fresh install didn't copy the crack but i still got an error says:The ordinal 5377 could not be located in the dynamic link library xlive.dll

im running in 
intel dual core 2.60 ghz
windows 7 ultimate
nvidia 9500 gt 1gb 128mb
2 gb of ram

i played it without an update and it works without errors..
i already install windows live and downloaded a xlive.dll but doesn't fix the problem hope you can help me

Hey y'all, having the same problem as kysounagi here. I first got the game and it would go through the intro movie and I could not skip it and when it ended, couldn't use my keyboard at all. Seemed like I needed to install the patch and then when I do when I run .exe get the same error message WETF!
Since it worked for me i don't know how to help. Try updating GFWL.

For the "Ordinal 5377" error, the xlive.dll actually comes in the 'Games for Live' package installer. I was getting the same error problem, but after I installed the WindowsGamesForLive package, it worked fine. Try this link:

http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=128962

For the "Ordinal 5377" error, the xlive.dll actually comes in the 'Games for Live' package installer. I was getting the same error problem, but after I installed the WindowsGamesForLive package, it worked fine. Try this link:

go(.)microsoft(.)com/fwlink/?LinkId=128962 

Obviously, you need to remove the parentheses.
If you are getting the "Ordinal 5377" error, Google: "games for live package installer." I was getting the same error issue, but after I installed the GFWL, the game worded perfectly.
Sorry for the multiple posts - I couldn't see them posting....so I kept sending until I was sure it posted. Just tryin' to help out.
Just got an stop downloading email from Cox about this.
